name: Roll - The Die
description:
Roll is a die in a Tabletop Game "Paint it!".

One day, Roll fell off the table, into the realms of fuzzy the carpet dimension.

In order to climb its way out, Roll must roll (no pun intended) and paint its faces, which let him stick to surfaces of the same color.

Controls:

    

AD to move. 

   

Arrow keys to rotate.

   

Space to jump

   
Shift to break free from sticking to a wall.


Created by:

Nir Zaid - https://nir-zaid.itch.io/

Igor Kheison - https://kheison.itch.io/

Roman Kuzminsky - https://romaner811.itch.io/

Ofir Goldstein - https://retrofir.itch.io/ 

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
